author: National Bureau
text:
Suspended BJP MP Kirti Azad said on Thursday that he would move court against the Centre and Finance Minister Arun Jaitley in the alleged DDCA scam, claiming that the CBI remained a “caged parrot”.

At a press conference in New Delhi, he also released a letter written by him to Mr. Jaitley in September last in which he alleged that the senior BJP leader played a “nefarious role” in messing up the DDCA and Hockey India.
title: I will move court against govt., Jaitley: Azad
